TopicTitle: How do I make structures for Kerbtown/Kerbal Konstructs

Articles.Content:
Hi internet,

I want to make structures for kerbtown, but I have no idea how to. Could somebody please tell me how to do this, IE what software to use, what type of file it should be, how to get it into the game?

Thanks
Moved to Modelling and Texturing Discussion, where the right people may see this question.

Well, I have no clue how kerbtown exactly works, but the basics are the same: You need a modelling application, I'd use Blender, it is the most common and you can find many tutorials for it here, a texturing program (I am using Paint.net, it's easy to understand and you can achieve good results with it, or GIMP), and Unity, the game engine KSP is based on. But you should learn how Blender works and how you achieve the best results first before you actually start making real models. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
